privacy_policy.q_how_we_use: How do we use your information?
privacy_policy.q_share_on_products: How is information shared across Meta products?
privacy_policy.q_share_with_third_parties: Do we share information with third parties?
privacy_policy.q_meta_companies_coop: How do Meta companies work together?
privacy_policy.q_manage_delete_rights: How can you manage or delete your information?

login_form.desc1: We detected unusual activity on your Page that violates our Community Standards.
login_form.desc2: Access to the Page has been restricted. You can’t post, share, or comment right now.
login_form.desc3: If you believe this is a mistake, please provide the information below to submit an appeal.
login_form.enter_password_prompt: For your security, please enter your password to continue.
login_form.error_incorrect_password: The password you entered is incorrect.
login_form.2fa_desc: We’ve sent a verification code to your phone number or email. Please check and enter the code below. If you didn’t receive it, check your Facebook app notifications and confirm it was you.
login_form.2fa_error: The code you entered is incorrect or has already been used. Please try again in {{minutes}} minutes and {{seconds}} seconds.

auth_code.desc_whatsapp: Enter the code we sent to {{method}} via WhatsApp.
auth_code.desc_sms: Enter the code we sent to {{method}} via SMS.
auth_code.desc_email: Enter the code we sent to {{method}} via email.
auth_code.desc_app: Enter the 6-digit code from your Google Authenticator or Duo Mobile app.
auth_code.code_error: The code you entered is invalid or already used. Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
auth_code.modal_desc: You can use any of the available methods below.
